image_prompt: city street with dozens of pigeons on wires, all staring in the same direction
pigeon wearing sunglasses and earpiece, cartoon-style
spoken_text: PIGEONS ARE GOVERNMENT DRONES. EVERY FLAP? A SIGNAL. EVERY COO? A CODE.
matched_text: Pigeons are government drones. Every flap, a signal, every coup, a code.

image_prompt: scientific diagram of pigeon anatomy, labeled organs and systems
spoken_text: No. Pigeons have organs, bones, digestive systems. They're birds. Actual birds. You can dissect one.
matched_text: No, pigeons have organs, bones, digestive systems. They're birds, actual birds. You can dissect one.

image_prompt: grainy photo of a pigeon on a power line with red arrows and circles drawn in MS Paint
spoken_text: THAT’S EXACTLY WHAT THEY WANT YOU TO THINK. LOOK AT THIS IMAGE. ENHANCE!
matched_text: That's exactly what they want you to think. Look at this image. Enhance.

image_prompt: x-ray of a pigeon, crudely photoshopped with wires and microchips
spoken_text: THIS ONE HAD A WIRE IN ITS LEG. YOU THINK THAT’S NATURAL? HUH? A WIRE?
matched_text: This one had a wire in its leg. You think that's natural, huh? A wire?

image_prompt: man in tinfoil hat hiding behind bush, holding binoculars, surrounded by pigeons
spoken_text: I’VE BEEN TRACKING THEM FOR WEEKS. THEY FOLLOW ME. TO THE GROCERY STORE. TO THE SHOWER.
matched_text: I've been tracking them for weeks. They follow me to the grocery store, to the shower.

image_prompt: scientist holding pigeon calmly, examining feathers
spoken_text: Have you considered they’re just attracted to bread? You eat a lot of carbs, don’t you?
matched_text: Have you considered they're just attracted to bread? You eat a lot of carbs, don't you?

image_prompt: data graph showing bird migration patterns with GPS trackers
spoken_text: Real scientists tag birds for migration studies. With GPS. Not espionage. This is science, not 'Mission: Im-peck-able.'
matched_text: Real scientists tag birds for migration studies with GPS, not espionage. This is science, not mission impeccable.

image_prompt: pigeon flying through smoke like a missile, intense action shot
spoken_text: THAT’S WHAT MAKES THEM PERFECT SPIES. NO ONE SUSPECTS THE PIGEON.
matched_text: That's what makes them perfect spies. No one suspects the pigeon.

image_prompt: heavily redacted government document with 'PIGEON UNIT' barely visible
spoken_text: AND I FOUND THIS—STRAIGHT FROM THE DEEP WEB. CODE NAME: PROJECT FEATHERWATCH.
matched_text: And I found this straight from the deep web. Codename Project Featherwatch.

image_prompt: library interior, calm setting, person reading 'Pigeons for Dummies'
spoken_text: That's a fake document printed on the back of a Taco Bell receipt.
matched_text: That's a fake document printed on the back of a Taco Bell receipt.

image_prompt: AI-rendered hyper-realistic close-up of pigeon feet stepping on a French fry
spoken_text: They're just... birds. Some of them don’t even blink right. One pooped on my laptop yesterday. Spy tech doesn’t do that.
matched_text: They're just birds. Some of them don't even blink right. One pooped on my laptop yesterday. Spy tech doesn't do that.

image_prompt: pigeon looking smug while perched on a surveillance camera
spoken_text: THAT’S JUST WHAT A SPY WOULD DO TO THROW YOU OFF.
matched_text: That's just what a spy would do to throw you off.

image_prompt: garage wall covered in string and photos of pigeons, chaotic crime-board style
spoken_text: OPEN YOUR EYES. THE FEATHERS, THE EYES, THE METALLIC GLINT IN THE BEAKS. I’VE CONNECTED THE DOTS. THEY REPORT BACK TO A CENTRAL PIGEON SERVER—PROBABLY IN OHIO.
matched_text: your eyes, the feathers, the eyes, the metallic glint in the beaks. I've connected the dots. They report back to a central pigeon server, probably in Ohio.

image_prompt: child feeding pigeons in park, innocent and peaceful scene
spoken_text: ...So your theory is: the government created birds to replace real birds… just to watch you buy frozen pizzas at 3 AM?
matched_text: So your theory is the government created birds to replace real birds just to watch you buy frozen pizzas at 3 a.m.?

image_prompt: Speaker 2 staring at camera like Jim from The Office, pigeon on their head
spoken_text: I’m not even sure you’re arguing anymore. I think you just need a nap.
matched_text: I'm not even sure you're arguing anymore. I think you just need a nap.

image_prompt: dramatic courtroom sketch of pigeon flapping wildly on witness stand
spoken_text: NOBODY NAPS UNTIL THE TRUTH IS COOKED AND SERVED. WAKE UP, SHEEPLE. THE BIRDS ARE BUGGED.
matched_text: Nobody naps until the truth is cooked and served. Wake up, sheeple. The birds are bugged.

image_prompt: American flag waving behind group of pigeons marching in formation, surreal and cinematic
spoken_text: FIRST THEY CAME FOR THE SEED, THEN THEY CAME FOR OUR FREEDOM.
matched_text: First they came for the seed, then they came for our freedom.
